name: BEST WESTERN Grove City Inn

reviews.text: Clean room, friendly front desk staff, no problem with our reservation and lots of parking. Even the small in-door pool was okay. Breakfast is a little cramped next to the front desk. Show your key card and get 10% off at the Kings restaurant next door, or the Eat-n-Park across the street. With a child in college near-by, we'll be back often.
reviews.title: Nice stay

likes.liked: — Value - clean room at a great price!
likes.disliked: — Free breakfast was cramped and crowded.

reviews.title: Stay somewhere else
reviews.text: Our toilet overflowed the morning we left. There was no vent fan in the bathroom. The sheets were dirty. Complained at check out. They said we should have told them the night before about the sheets. We were late going to bed and slept on top of the covers. Contacted Best Western and they said I would receive an email from the hotel directly in 7 days that was on August 29th still have not heard anything. We do not plan on using Best Western again.

aka: Best Western Grove City Hotel Grove City
